txt.en:
'You have done much for us, and it feels unfair to ask for more, but I must. The tomb-robbers we drove from Rantost fled to the south and are now threatening our hold within the Way of Kings. The Way of Kings is where the ancient rulers of my people are buried. Those that watched over Ann√∫minas and Evendim from on high now sleep below. Their memories are to be cherished and thought of often, but their tombs are not to be disturbed.

'I have also heard rumours and whispers of another force amongst the ruins. I believe you have encountered them already within the estates to the east of here. I fear we have little time to determine their motives and defeat them before it will be too late.

'Head south to the Way of Kings and meet up with Nimbellas at his camp and see what you can do to help.'
'There is much work to be done, and if we are to succeed, it must be done quickly.'
'Go south and see what aid you can provide.'
The camp within the Way of Kings is watching over the tombs of the Rangers' ancestral rulers.
Talk to Nimbellas at the Way of Kings camp
Nimbellas is at the Ranger-camp in the Way of Kings, south of Tinnudir.
